div.style: text-align: left;width: 300px;background-color: white;margin: 20px;padding: 15px;font-size: 14px; padding-bottom: 30px;display: inline-block;font-family: "Inconsolata";border: solid 1px rgb(220,220,220);border-radius: 3px;overflow: hidden;

li.t-att-class: "head_icon_li delivery_icon pos-cart-bottom-left pos-cart-top-left " + ((sorder.state == "draft") or (sorder.state == "sent") or (sorder.state == "sale" and sorder.invoice_payment_status == "not_paid") ? "yellow_bgcolor ":"") + ((slevel == 1) ? "" : "") + ((slevel == 2) ? "pos_header_zoom1" : "") + ((slevel == 3) ? "pos_header_zoom2" : "") + ((slevel == 4) ? "pos_header_zoom3" : "")

"pos-cart-top-right pos-cart-bottom-right head_so_li_width pos-cart-header-li " + ((sorder.state == "draft") or (sorder.state == "sent") or (sorder.state == "sale" and sorder.invoice_payment_status == "not_paid") ? "yellow_bgcolor ":"") + ((slevel == 1) ? "" : "") + ((slevel == 2) ? "pos_header_zoom1" : "") + ((slevel == 3) ? "pos_header_zoom2" : "") + ((slevel == 4) ? "pos_header_zoom3" : "")

"pos-cart-top-right pos-cart-bottom-right head_so_li_width pos-cart-header-li " + ((sorder.state == "draft") or (sorder.state == "sent") or (sorder.state == "sale" and sorder.invoice_payment_status == "not_paid") ? "yellow_bgcolor ":"") + ((slevel == 1) ? "" : "") + ((slevel == 2) ? "pos_header_zoom1" : "") + ((slevel == 3) ? "pos_header_zoom2" : "") + ((slevel == 4) ? "pos_header_zoom3" : "")

span.t-att-class: (((sorder.state != "draft" or sorder.state != "sent") and line.kitchen_state == "confirm") ? "disable_confirm round-btn pos-kit-reverse" : "reverse_view_btn round-btn pos-kit-reverse confirm_bgcolor")

(((sorder.state == "draft" or sorder.state == "sent" or sorder.state == "sale") and sorder.invoice_payment_status == "not_paid") ? "disable_confirm round-btn pos-kit-forward" : "forward_view_btn round-btn pos-kit-forward confirm_bgcolor")

li.t-att-class: "head_icon_li delivery_icon pos-cart-bottom-left pos-cart-top-left " + ((sorder.state == "draft") or (sorder.state == "sent") or (sorder.state == "sale" and sorder.invoice_payment_status == "not_paid") ? "yellow_bgcolor ":"") + ((slevel == 1) ? "" : "") + ((slevel == 2) ? "pos_header_zoom1" : "") + ((slevel == 3) ? "pos_header_zoom2" : "") + ((slevel == 4) ? "pos_header_zoom3" : "")

"pos-cart-top-right pos-cart-bottom-right head_so_li_width pos-cart-header-li " + ((sorder.state == "draft") or (sorder.state == "sent") or (sorder.state == "sale" and sorder.invoice_payment_status == "not_paid") ? "yellow_bgcolor ":"") + ((slevel == 1) ? "" : "") + ((slevel == 2) ? "pos_header_zoom1" : "") + ((slevel == 3) ? "pos_header_zoom2" : "") + ((slevel == 4) ? "pos_header_zoom3" : "")
li.span:
Status :
Open
Order Confirm
Preparing
Ready to Pickup
Delivered
Payment
